name: (NES) FISH
description:
Made in 48 hours for Alakajam 17, handcrafted 6502 assembly. Climb to the top of the map to win! Watch out for traps! 

Tips:

Your health decreases slowly over time and when you shoot. Enter water to instantly refill. STAY HYDRATED! All traps are avoidable and can be spotted if you're paying attention. Don't touch the fire!

If you're playing in the browser, cursor keys and z/x are the default controls. Enter restarts if you die
